SELECT r.id, r.charge_id, ord.order_sn AS orderSn, r.price, ( CASE r.pay_status WHEN 'waitpay' THEN '待支付' WHEN 'payed' THEN '已支付' WHEN 'paying' THEN '支付中' WHEN 'cancel' THEN '取消中' END ) AS pay_status, r.pay_time, ( CASE r.pay_platform WHEN 'wx' THEN '微信' WHEN 'wx_pub_qr' THEN '微信扫码' WHEN 'wx_pub' THEN '微信公众号' WHEN 'alipay' THEN '支付宝' WHEN 'alipay_qr' THEN '支付宝扫码' WHEN 'gapay' THEN '国安付' WHEN 'union_pay' THEN '银行卡支付' WHEN 'pos' THEN 'POS' WHEN 'cash' THEN '现金' END ) AS pay_platform, s. NAME AS store_name, e. NAME AS eshop_name, e.id AS eshop_id, ( CASE e.self WHEN 'yes' THEN '是' WHEN 'no' THEN '否' END ) AS self, r.pay_sn AS paySn, r.pay_source AS paySource FROM t_order_receipts AS r
LEFT JOIN t_store s ON r.store_id = s.id LEFT JOIN t_eshop e ON r.eshop_id = e.id LEFT JOIN t_order ord ON ord.group_id = r.order_group_id LEFT JOIN t_order_flow flow ON flow.order_id = ord.id AND flow.order_status = 'signed'
WHERE r.type <> 'fake' AND ( ord.is_split = 'no' OR NOT EXISTS ( SELECT id FROM t_order ord1 WHERE ord1.group_id = ord.group_id AND ord1.order_sn < ord.order_sn ) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT id FROM t_order_flow subflow WHERE subflow.order_id = flow.order_id AND subflow.order_status = 'signed' AND subflow.create_time < flow.create_time ) AND r.pay_platform in
#{item}
AND r.pay_status = 'payed' AND r.pay_time >= #{startTime} AND r.pay_time <= #{endTime} ORDER BY r.pay_time DESC
